title: Memories Returned
author: Crooked_Crow
characters: Gonathan G | Gigi Murin's Alter Ego
summary:
You've recovered a portion of your memories.

 

 

Gonathan G was an honorable knight.

 

Gigi Murin was... not that.

 

 

Gonathan doesn't know how to confront his memories.

title: Atonement
author: Satashi
summary:
After Elizabeth chooses to side with Nerissa during Advent's betrayal, she finds herself living with the traitors at an old abandoned fort. Yet residents seem to come to them, and soon their little rebellion has its own small town spreading out from their new home.

 

Now Elizabeth must deal with not only her choice, but with the puppet master Shiori, who caused all of her problems. Nerissa is trying to keep them from fighting, but the hatred she feels for the archiver is strong... So why is Shiori, who also hates her, acting so different now that they are together all the time? And what secret is being kept from Elizabeth that both Nerissa and Shiori know?

 

"Something that will make me join your side without hesitation, that wouild make me leave all my friends to follow Shiori... what are you not telling me?"

title: For he knows a selfish request such as his, could never be true.
author: Crooked_Crow
characters: Gonathan G | Gigi Murin's Alter Ego
tags: i am giving gonathan happiness and taking it back again
summary:
Amelia Watson was used to getting thrown in time.

 

Amelia Watson was used to getting stuck in time.

 

Amelia Watson was used to getting picked up like a stray off the street.

 

Amelia Watson was not used to Gonathan G, the loyal knight of the Cerulean Cups.

title: Death Do Us Part
author: PencilOfDarkness
summary:
Love might have been a nice idea, but Calli knew better. It was nothing but a fleeting fairy tale that her friends were all chasing towards an inevitable bitter end. Not even Gonathon’s marriage seemed built to last, so what hope was there for someone like her?

 

There was nobody in the world who would marry a Grim Reaper, anyway. And there was definitely nobody in particular that the Grim Reaper had ever explicitly thought about marrying and/or running a restaurant with, despite the name the persistent, cheeky little skeleton voices in her head kept throwing out at her.

 

-

 

A tournament to win the hand of Libestal’s most eligible tavern keeper is brewing, with plots, conspiracies, and shenanigans aplenty. The problem is, no one actually bothered to consult Calli about it.

 

Being an unwilling tournament prize is the least of her troubles, though. As she and Kiara navigate a strange dungeon in the wastelands, Calli is faced with memories of a past life she’d rather forget. Now, she must unravel the painful truth of why Reapers can’t fall in love in order to rewrite her destiny.

 

A tale spanning two lifetimes: a romantic tragedy, and a comedy of errors in which true love eventually prevails.

title: your softness tears me to shreds
author: of_aphelion
tags: this is after they both get their memories back
summary:
“Liz,” Nerissa says softly, half-consciously reaching forward in a feeble attempt to offer comfort, “Liz, I’m so sorry.”

 

“Why are you apologizing,” Elizabeth half-screams, half-cries, spit flying from her lips, “when I have done nothing but try to tear you apart, when all I have ever done for you is lock you away and trap you and hurt you, why should you be the one to say the gods-damned sorry when everything I’ve—”

 

“Liz,” Nerissa murmurs, with all the care in the world, and Elizabeth stops. “You know that isn’t true.”

chapters.title: Chapter 1
chapters.summary:

“Liz,” Nerissa murmurs, with all the care in the world, and Elizabeth stops. “You know that isn’t true.”

title: Red Never Wins
author: Kitduck_B
tags: Elizabeth Rose/Romeo/Smith Bloodflame needs a hug even though she says she doesn't
summary:
For the first time in ages, Elizabeth Bloodflame has felt at ease. They had saved the world from ruination, her friends were all here, Libestal would stand tall come the next dawn!

 

Unfortunately, she remains blind to even the things right in front of her.

title: Tfw you fight a Time God and you have amnesia
author: Lilac_Gold
tags: Kronii and Elizabeth be flirting but you can see them as platonic
summary:
“Your mother is a hamster and your father smells of Elderberry.”

 

With a head full of amnesia and a tongue for mischief, Elizabeth makes friends with the only way she knew how– Fighting.

 

Aka I saw Liz’s stream and I wanted to write Kronii’s and Elizabeth’s fight scene that never happened.
